personalInformation.miniAbout: Hello, I'm Leonardo, student and developer. Welcome to my website!
personalInformation.about: I have a degree in computer science at Universidade Paulista (UNIP) and a developer at TradePro Tecnologia. In addition, I'm taking a postgraduate course in Mobile Multiplatform Development at Faculdade Descomplica. Currently I work with fullstack projects, using the programming languages, Node (TypeScript), React and Firebase. I spent a long time focused on web development with React and Node, but today, I try to improve myself in the mobile area with React Native.
